Package net.minestom.server.entity.hologram

Class Hologram

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minestom.server.entity.hologram.Hologram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Viewable
    public class Hologram
extends Object
implements Viewable
    Represents an invisible armor stand showing a Component.
